flavorText.text:
つめたい　みずのなかで　せいかつ。
あたりが　すずしくなると　エサを
さがしに　ちじょうにも　あらわれる。

ゆうぐれどき　すずしくなると
みずから　あがってきた　ウパーたちは
エサを　さがして　みずべを　あるく。

ふだんは　みずの　なかで　くらしているが　エサを
さがすときなど　たまに　ちじょうに　でてくる。
りくでは　どくの　ねんえきで　からだを　おおう。

ふだんは　みずの　なかで　くらしているが　エサを
さがすときなど　たまに　ちじょうに　でてくる。
りくでは　どくの　ねんえきで　からだを　おおう。

つめたい　みずのなかで　せいかつ。
あたりが　すずしくなると　エサを
さがしに　ちじょうにも　あらわれる。

ちじょうを　あるくときは　ひふが
かんそう　しないように　どくの
ねんまくで　からだを　おおっている。

차가운 물속에서 생활한다.
근처가 선선해지면 먹이를
찾으러 지상에도 나타난다.

해질녘 시원해지면
물에서 올라온 우파들은
먹이를 찾으러 물가를 걷는다.

평상시엔 물속에서 지내지만 먹이를
찾거나 할 때는 가끔 지상에 나온다.
땅에서는 독 점액으로 몸을 둘러싼다.

평상시엔 물속에서 지내지만 먹이를
찾거나 할 때는 가끔 지상에 나온다.
땅에서는 독 점액으로 몸을 둘러싼다.

차가운 물속에서 생활한다.
근처가 선선해지면 먹이를
찾으러 지상에도 나타난다.

지상에서 걸을 때는 피부가
건조해지지 않도록 독성분의
점막으로 몸을 감싸고 있다.

在冰冷的水中生活。
當周遭的天氣變涼時，
也會來到陸地上覓食。

為了在地面上行走時
不讓皮膚乾燥，會用
有毒的黏膜覆蓋身體。

Sur la terre ferme, il couvre son
corps d’un fluide toxique qui le
protège de la déshydratation.

Sur la terre ferme, il couvre son
corps d’un fluide toxique qui le
protège de la déshydratation.

Ce Pokémon vit en eaux froides. Il ne les quitte que
pour se nourrir quand il fait froid à l’extérieur.

Il émerge de l’eau lorsque l’air se rafraîchit pour
partir chasser sur les berges.

Axoloto vit généralement dans l’eau. Mais de temps en temps,
il vient sur terre pour chercher à manger. À terre, il recouvre
son corps d’un voile visqueux et toxique.

Axoloto vit généralement dans l’eau. Mais de temps en temps,
il vient sur terre pour chercher à manger. À terre, il recouvre
son corps d’un voile visqueux et toxique.

Ce Pokémon vit en eaux froides. Si la température
extérieure est assez basse, il lui arrive de
se rendre sur la terre ferme pour se nourrir.

Lorsqu’il est sur la terre ferme, il couvre
son corps d’un voile toxique qui le protège
de la déshydratation.

Dieses Pokémon lebt in Eiswasser. Wird es an Land
kalt, verlässt es das Wasser und sucht nach Futter.

Wenn es am Abend kühler wird, kommen sie an Land,
um nach Nahrung zu suchen.

Felino lebt eigentlich im Wasser. Manchmal kommt es jedoch
an Land, um nach Nahrung zu suchen. An Land bedeckt es
seinen Körper mit einem schleimigen Giftfilm.

Felino lebt eigentlich im Wasser. Manchmal kommt es jedoch
an Land, um nach Nahrung zu suchen. An Land bedeckt es
seinen Körper mit einem schleimigen Giftfilm.

Dieses Pokémon lebt in kaltem Wasser. Wenn die
Temperaturen an Land tief genug fallen, verlässt
es das Wasser und sucht dort nach Futter.

An Land bedeckt es seine Haut mit einer giftigen
Schicht, die es vor dem Austrocknen bewahrt.

Este Pokémon vive en aguas frías. Sale del agua para
buscar comida cuando refresca el ambiente.

Cuando la temperatura baja por la tarde, emerge del
agua y va a la orilla en busca de comida.

Wooper suele vivir en el agua, pero es posible también verle
en tierra en busca de comida. Cuando está en terreno firme,
se cubre con una película viscosa tóxica.

Wooper suele vivir en el agua, pero es posible también verle
en tierra en busca de comida. Cuando está en terreno firme,
se cubre con una película viscosa tóxica.

Este Pokémon vive en aguas frías. Sale del agua
para buscar comida cuando refresca el ambiente.

Cuando se desplaza en tierra firme, cubre su
cuerpo con una membrana mucosa y venenosa
para mantener hidratada la piel.

Vive nell’acqua fredda. Quando fa freddo fuori,
esce dall’acqua per cercare cibo.

Attende la sera, quando scende la temperatura, per
avventurarsi sulla riva alla ricerca di cibo.

Di solito Wooper vive in acqua. Tuttavia, talvolta si avventura
sulla terraferma in cerca di cibo. In queste occasioni, si ricopre
il corpo di una sostanza appiccicosa e velenosa.

Di solito Wooper vive in acqua. Tuttavia, talvolta si avventura
sulla terraferma in cerca di cibo. In queste occasioni, si ricopre
il corpo di una sostanza appiccicosa e velenosa.

Vive nell’acqua fredda. Quando la temperatura
esterna è abbastanza fresca, si spinge sulla
terraferma in cerca di cibo.

Quando si avventura sulla terraferma, ricopre
il suo corpo di una sostanza velenosa che
lo mantiene idratato.

This POKéMON lives
in cold water. It
will leave the water to search
for food when it
gets cold outside.

When it walks a­
round on the
ground, it coats its body with a
slimy, poisonous
film.

A mucous
membrane covers
its body. Touching it barehanded will
cause a shooting
pain.

WOOPER usually lives in water.
However, it occasionally comes out onto
land in search of food. On land, it coats its body with a gooey,
toxic film.

WOOPER usually lives in water.
However, it occasionally comes out onto
land in search of food. On land, it coats its body with a gooey,
toxic film.

WOOPER usually live in water but come
out onto land seeking food occasionally.
On land, they coat their bodies with a
gooey, toxic film.

When it walks around on the ground,
it coats its body with a slimy, poisonous
film.

This POKéMON lives in cold water. It will
leave the water to search for food when
it gets cold outside.

It lives in cold water, half
burying itself in mud at the
bottom to sleep.

When the temperature cools in the
evening, they emerge from water
to seek food along the shore.

When walking on land, it covers its
body with a poisonous film that
keeps its skin from dehydrating.

This Pokémon lives in cold water.
It will leave the water to search
for food when it gets cold outside.

When it walks around on the
ground, it coats its body with a
slimy, poisonous film.

When walking on land, it covers its
body with a poisonous film that
keeps its skin from dehydrating.

body with a poisonous film that
keeps its skin from dehydrating.

body with a poisonous film that
keeps its skin from dehydrating.

body with a poisonous film that
keeps its skin from dehydrating.

This Pokémon lives in cold water. It will leave the
water to search for food when it gets cold outside.

When the temperature cools in the evening,
they emerge from water to seek food along
the shore.

Wooper usually lives in water. However, it occasionally comes
out onto land in search of food. On land, it coats its body with
a gooey, toxic film.

Wooper usually lives in water. However, it occasionally comes
out onto land in search of food. On land, it coats its body with
a gooey, toxic film.

This Pokémon lives in cold water. It will leave the
water to search for food when it gets cold outside.

When walking on land, it covers its body with a
poisonous film that keeps its skin from dehydrating.

在冰冷的水中生活。
附近天气变凉之后，
也会来到地上觅食。

为了在地面上行走时
不让皮肤干燥，会用
有毒的粘膜覆盖身体。
